entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Port Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:44 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Rain, 6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hawkesbury Airport 1:11 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Rain
Temperature: 6.1°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 5.8°C
Wind: SE 37 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 100 this afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending late this evening then partly cloudy with showers beginning overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 100 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 this evening then diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
